summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5770 for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 33 and 34, Denny and Hoyt's Addition, being the alley between North 34th Street and North 35th Street, from Aurora Avenue to Fremont Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76074, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
